Synonyms.Synonym: Familial amyloid nephropathy due to apolipoprotein A-II variant
Familial renal amyloidosis due to apolipoprotein A-II variant
Hereditary amyloid nephropathy due to apolipoprotein A-II variant
Hereditary renal amyloidosis due to apolipoprotein A-II variant

TextSection.Contents: A rare hereditary amyloidosis with primary renal involvement characterized by variable onset of renal insufficiency with edema hypertension proteinuria and azotemia eventually leading to end-stage renal disease. Amyloid cardiomyopathy and histopathological evidence of amyloid deposition in other organs such as the spleen liver adrenal glands and pancreas among others have also been described.

Parent.Label: Hereditary amyloidosis with primary renal involvement
